name: lambda
description: Example of a lambda function using express and openapi spec

scripts.test: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts.test-silent: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --detectOpenHandles --forceExit --silent
scripts.test-coverage: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --detectOpenHandles --forceExit --coverage
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm install && npm run generate:sdk && npm run build
